form.label: Bytes Sent and Received
form.searchTemplate: index="esg_transaction" WorkflowName!=NULL | soaekv | search /logEntry/body/subEntry/body/transactionStart/workflowName = $wkfl$ | timechart sum(/logEntry/body/subEntry/body/inputServerSummary/requestSize) AS request_Size, sum("/logEntry/body/subEntry/body/invocationAgentSummary[0]/requestSize") AS Invoke0_requestSize, sum("/logEntry/body/subEntry/body/invocationAgentSummary[0]/responseSize") AS Invoke0_responseSize, sum("/logEntry/body/subEntry/body/invocationAgentSummary[1]/requestSize") AS Invoke1_requestSize, sum("/logEntry/body/subEntry/body/invocationAgentSummary[1]/responseSize") AS Invoke1_responseSize, sum(/logEntry/body/subEntry/body/inputServerSummary/responseSize) AS response_Size

chart.title: Bytes sent and received by SOAE for requests
